title: 06/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Chris Paul, Fragile Nets, Chris Broussard
itunes:title: 06/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Chris Paul, Fragile Nets, Chris Broussard
description:
In hour 1, Colin discusses Chris Paul's role on his teams throughout his career. The fragile Nets and how Kevin Durant may be dealing with those pressures being the lone Star left on the court. Aaron Rodger may have unfair and unrealistic expectations placed on him and Chris Broussard joins to talk NBA Playoffs and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
